reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress to be a perfect holiday dress with a true babydoll style, and appreciate its good quality, color accuracy, and comfort.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this green dress
items.body: I recently purchased this green velvet dress, and it absolutely exceeded my expectations. The deep emerald color is rich and vibrant — exactly the kind of shade that turns heads without being too flashy. The velvet fabric feels soft and luxurious, with just the right amount of sheen to catch the light in the most flattering way. The fit is true to size and incredibly flattering — it hugs in all the right places without feeling restrictive. I wore it to a fall wedding and received compliments all night. It’s warm enough for cooler weather but still breathable. I also appreciate the subtle details like the slightly puffed sleeves and the elegant neckline, which give it a timeless, vintage-inspired feel. If you're looking for a statement dress for the holidays, a winter party, or a formal evening out, this green velvet beauty is a winner. Just add a pair of gold heels and a bold lip, and you're good to go. Read more
items.author: Crystal Owens

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soft and just super cute and flattering!
items.body: This dress is adorable! Fits true to size! The material is very soft and I love that it was hardly wrinkled when I took it out of the package! Love all of the color options. Would be so cute dressed up or even dressed down with a flat mule shoe. Material is lightweight and breathable. Highly recommend. Read more
items.author: Caroline Lutz

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Considered keeping it
items.body: Bought this to wear to a holiday party and just wasn't feeling it 100% due to the neck. BUT, you might like it. I really thought about keeping it. It was cute, wasn't tight on the stomach, wasn't too long/short and the material was nice. Could also be really nice for a fall photo shoot and it comes in other colors. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress!
items.body: Love this dress so much! I already had the light blue version and came back for the green. Comfortable. Great quality. No slip needed. Modest but nice. Wore to my company party and to a church event. Read more
items.author: Rachell

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect holiday dress
items.body: It was so cute on. True to size. Great dress for holidays! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Disappointed Boho Gal
items.body: I purchased this dress in the Fuscia color. I found it baggy in the upper chest area and I didn't care for the sleeve's finishes so I returned it. Otherwise everything about this dress was fine. The Fuscia was beautiful. The length was good. The sizing was accurate. The sleeve style was pretty. It was comfortable. however, the sleeve's finishes and the upper chest bagginess were enough to choose not to keep it. Read more
items.author: Happy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fall/winter dress!
items.body: This dress is perfect! For reference, I am 5’8” with long legs, 150lbs and I got a M. I absolutely love it! The fabric was soft and comfortable and the fit was very nice. I will also likely wear it with black leggings to be a bit warmer during the winter. For the price/quality, it was a very good deal! 10/10, would recommend! Read more
items.author: gins71

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Too tight on top
items.body: I usually wear a medium. I believe this is not true to size. It was way too tight on top. If you're full busted, it won't fit, unfortunately. Read more
items.author: Monica B.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black Starry, Wine Red, Grayish Blue, Purple, Fuchsia, Black, Violet Red, Red Starry, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
